Title: Terminates the parental rights of a person convicted of rape resulting in the conception of a child
Summary: Terminates the parental rights with respect to a specific child of a person convicted of rape that resulted in the conception of such child.
LawCode: Amd ยง130.92, Pen L; add Art 5 Part 6 ยง566, Fam Ct Act
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the penal law and the family court act, in relation to terminating the parental rights with respect to a specific child of a person convicted of rape that resulted in the conception of such child
